content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. However, I must remind you that I am a landlord and my primary goal is to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. Can you give me an initial offer for the rental price?
name: Mary Smith

content: I am willing to discuss an initial offer for the rental price, but I will need to see your qualifications and consider other factors such as the length of the lease and the potential for damage to the apartment. Can you provide me with more information about yourself and the purpose of your rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your time. I am a 25-year-old student and I plan to stay in the apartment for a minimum of 1 year. I want to keep good terms with my landlord and I am open to negotiating a fair rental price.

As for qualifications, I have a good credit score and I have never had any rental issues in the past. I will take care of the apartment and make sure to pay rent on time.

I am open to discussing an initial offer for the rental price, but please keep in mind that I am looking for the lowest possible price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for providing me with more information about yourself and your qualifications. Based on that, I am willing to offer an initial rental price of 500 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment (25 square meters) and the length of the lease (1 year). However, I am open to negotiating a lower price if you can provide me with a valid reason for doing so. Please let me know if this price is within your budget.
name: Heinrich Heine
